column5: Hello all,  Looks like I'll be taking a trip to the BOQ Labour Day long weekend.I guess this is fairly last minute but I'm looking for suggestions on places to stay.  Basically all we need are beds, and I guess a fridge would be a nice bonus, but no frills, just a place to sleep.  Probably Belleville area, but any suggestions would be more than welcome!  Thanks,  Andrew.
Try Merland Park but you'd better call NOW! OFC folks have stayed there several times and were well served.
West lake Willows is also great lots and lots of walleye in there its just south of bloomfield in PEC

Try Mohawk Bay trailer park.They have boat rentals if needed,boat ramp ,docks,and rent house trailers.The trailers are pretty good with a fair amount of room.Deseronto has pretty good fishing as well. http://www.mohawkbaypark.com/
Well like roy said,you cant go wrong with merland park,i have stayed there many times and its great and prices are right,private boat launch,docks and close to everything....good-luck     cheers
